title: Staples Osgood Black Leather Office Chair
description:
Buy here: http://amzn.to/1OlKRFh

Item SKU: 923523    
Model: 21076D 

PRODUCT DETAILS:
Staples Osgood Leather Manager's Chair- Comfortable, Adjustable, and Elegant

    Bonded leather seating surfaces with contrast stitching
    Padded fixed arms for comfort and support
    Built-in lumbar support
    Center tilt with adjustable tilt tension with easy to reach side handle and tilt lock
    5-star nylon base with 2" hooded casters
    Dimensions: 42-3/4" - 46-1/2"H x 28-1/2"W x 30-7/8"D
    Seat size: 18-7/8" - 22-3/4"H x 20-1/2"W x 19-1/2"D
    Back size: 21-1/4"W x 26"H
    Weight rated up to 250 lbs based on 3-5 hours of use
    Meets or exceed ANSI/BIFMA standards
    Full assembly required
    5-year mfr. limited warranty


The Staples Osgood bonded-leather manager's high-back chair gives you the comfort you need to achieve your highest productivity, and its elegant design fits in well with any office furniture. It's fully adjustable, so it can accommodate your height and build. This chair is upholstered in durable and attractive bonded leather that is reinforced and enhanced with contrast stitching.

Comfortable Support
The seat and back of the Staples Osgood bonded-leather manager's high-back chair are padded for support and comfort. Its arms remain in a fixed position and are padded for extra comfort. The chair also features built-in lumbar support.

Durable and Elegant
The bonded-leather upholstery of the Staples Osgood bonded-leather manager's high-back chair is contrast stitched for additional strength and a classic look. The chair has a durable nylon base and casters that make it ideal for gliding across a protective chair mat or on your carpeted or tiled floor.

Sturdy and Adjustable
The Staples Osgood bonded-leather manager's high-back chair is rated for users who weigh up to 225 pounds. The height and tilt of the chair are fully and easily adjustable.

Warranty  5-year mfr. limited warranty
Assembly Required  Yes
Back dimensions  21-1/4"W x 26"H
Seat to floor  18-7/8" - 22-3/4"H
Meets ANSI/BIFMA standards  Yes
Base Material  Nylon
Back Material  Bonded Leather
Seat dimensions  20-1/2"W x 19-5/8"D
Overall dimensions  42 3/4" - 46 5/8"H x 28 5/8'W x 30 7/8"D
Tilt tension/Tilt lock  Yes / Yes
Weight Capacity  250 lbs
Base Color  Chrome
Caster Usage  Carpet
Adjustable Back Height  No
Seat Glide  No
Center Tilt  Yes
Adjustable Knee Tilt  No
Synchro Tilt  No
Lumbar Support  Yes
Adjustable Headrest  No
Rated level of use  5 hrs
Arm Height Adjustment  No
Chair Upholstery  Leather
Arm Style  Fixed Arms
